CoveredServices.Name: Application Layer Gateway Service
CoveredServices.Description: Provides support for 3rd party protocol plug-ins for Internet Connection Sharing

CoveredServices.Name: Application Identity
CoveredServices.Description: Determines and verifies the identity of an application. Disabling this service will prevent AppLocker from being enforced.

CoveredServices.Name: AppX Deployment Service (AppXSVC)
CoveredServices.Description: Provides infrastructure support for deploying Store applications. This service is started on demand and if disabled Store applications will not be deployed to the system, and may not function properly.
